attributes.additional_details:
We as the citizen of UK, ask Members of Parliament to stop broadcasting BBC 3 channel,because programs of this channel are against families principals and social moralities,BBC 3 programs according to statics are too high and by observing the outcome it's not in interest of BBC in whole and our community generally
there are no inputs for BBC 3 programs and they are wasting our taxes and national income so the programs are intolerable.
we are asking you kindly to stop broadcasting this channel.
attributes.background: We as the citizen of UK, asking Members of Parliament to stop broadcasting BBC 3 channel

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.

You might like to write to the BBC to make this suggestion.
